authors: La Regina G, Bai R, Coluccia A, Naccarato V, Famiglini V, Nalli M, Masci D, Verrico A, Rovella P, Mazzoccoli C, Da Pozzo E, Cavallini C, Martini C, Vultaggio S, Dondio G, Varasi M, Mercurio C, Hamel E, Lavia P, Silvestri R. 2018.
title: New 6- and 7-heterocyclyl-1H-indole derivatives as potent tubulin assembly and cancer  cell growth inhibitors.
